title: London bus crash latest: Bus mounts pavement near Victoria station, injuring 17 people
description: Fifteen people including the bus driver are taken to hospital and the Met Police appeals for witnesses to come forward.
content:
Commotion in the rush-hour commute
Freddy Tennyson
BBC London
Behind me you can see the spot where the bus left the road and crashed into a black barrier.
Firefighters are currently working to clear some of the debris from the scene.

title: Martha's rule rolled out to every acute hospital in England
description: The scheme was set up after the death of 13-year-old Martha Mills, who developed sepsis while under the care of the NHS in 2021. An inquest ruled she may have been saved had doctors identified concerns sooner.
content:
A new scheme that will allow worried families and patients to seek a rapid second opinion on their care is being rolled out to every acute hospital in England.
Martha's rule was set up after the death of 13-year-old Martha Mills, who developed sepsis... [3249 chars]

title: Lloyds to warn 3,000 staff they face sack for ‘underperformance’
description: With economic uncertainty meaning fewer people leave, bank to put about one in 20 on ‘performance plans’
content:
Lloyds Banking Group is to warn 3,000 staff that they are at risk of being sacked for underperformance, as part of a management overhaul led by the chief executive, Charlie Nunn.
Bosses have been instructed to rank staff performance, with about 5% of... [4397 chars]

title: Rachel Reeves declares confidence in Angela Rayner after stamp duty ‘error’
description: Chancellor defends deputy prime minister as more details emerge about timeline of legal advice
content:
The chancellor has said she has “full confidence” in Angela Rayner as more details emerged about when the deputy prime minister became aware she had underpaid tax.
Rayner has referred herself to the government’s independent ethics adviser and HM Reve... [3941 chars]

title: Liverpool parade accused Paul Doyle pleads not guilty
description: Paul Doyle, 53, denies 31 charges including causing grievous bodily harm with intent.
content:
Liverpool parade accused pleads not guilty
A man accused of "using his car as a weapon" by deliberately driving into crowds of Liverpool FC fans has pleaded not guilty to 31 charges.
More than 130 people, including eight children, were injured when a... [415 chars]
